model

Interface Model

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyModel

    public interface Model

    Model interface

    This interface represents a general model It has the functionality that a model must have.*
    Since:
    2014-09-14
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leibovitz Edan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exit()
      this method shuts down the model

    • Method Detail

      • getDirsAndFilesInPath

        String[] getDirsAndFilesInPath(String path)
        this method uses to display the content of path
        Parameters:
        path - the given path
        Returns:
        a string array of all the directories and files inside path

      • generateMaze

        void generateMaze(String name,
                  int floors,
                  int rows,
                  int cols,
                  String type)
        this method uses to generate a maze with the specified dimensions by a specific algorithm
        Parameters:
        name - name of the maze
        floors - number of floors in the maze
        rows - number of rows in the maze
        cols - number of columns in the maze
        type - the algorithm by which the maze is generated

      • getMaze

        Maze3d getMaze(String name)
        this method returns the maze 'name'
        Parameters:
        name - the maze name
        Returns:
        a maze with the specified name

      • exit

        void exit()
        this method shuts down the model

      • getCrossSection

        int[][] getCrossSection(int index,
                        String axis,
                        String name)
        this method gets a cross section by specific axis
        Parameters:
        index - the number of line
        axis - the axis to cut by
        name - the name of the requested maze
        Returns:
        the requested cross section

      • saveMaze

        void saveMaze(String name,
              String filename)
        this method saves the maze
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the maze
        filename - the name of the file in which the maze will be saved

      • loadMaze

        boolean loadMaze(String filename,
                 String name)
        this method loads a maze from a file
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file
        name - the name of the maze
        Returns:
        True in case saving was successful, False- otherwise

      • solveMaze

        void solveMaze(String name,
               String algorithm)
        this method solves the maze and stores the solution inside the model
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the maze
        algorithm - String that indicates the algorithm to be used (BFS/DFS)

      • getSolution

        Solution<Position> getSolution(String name)
        this method yields the solution according to maze 'name'
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the maze
        Returns:
        the maze 'name's solution stored in the model
